title: Changing League language (in game speech and what you see) 한국어로 어떻게 바꾸나요?
body:
So I was wondering if anyone knew why or the fix to this problem. As I have asked in the question above, I noticed that my friends were able to change their language from English to Korean by going to league folder -> RADS -> Locale.cpg and change the en_GB or en_NA to ko_KR and the patch would start once you start league. For me, this was not the case. When I started league after doing this, it said that there was an error and that I should check my logs to check what my problem was. Anyone know why it's doing this? {{champion:32}} 

안녕하세요. {{champion:103}}  저가 롤을 영어에서 한국어로 바꾸려 하는데 어떻게 하는지 아시는분 계시면 답장부탁함니다 {{champion:32}}

replies.body: We don't supported languages beyond what's already available on each server, per the [supported language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide.  I don't recommend making modifications as that will likely cause you more trouble like crashes in the future.  I recommend using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to repair your game and use the languages provided to your specific server.  Hopefully that clears things up!
